title: Karakudi Ilavarasi Lyrics Kalakalappu 2
stanzas:
karakudi ilavarasi
en nenja thaakura maharasi
thoothukudi varagarasi
nee kaaya podura ena alasi.

kannu
adhu gun-u madhiri
kannam
adhu bannu madhiri
paarvai
adhu jinnu madhiri
podhai uyethudhudaa

mooku
adhu gulfi madhiri
udhadu
adhu burgi madhiri
ponnu
iva vera madhiri
enna konnaadaa

masakkiye masakkiye
mayangi naanum ponenadi
sirikkiye sirikkiye
sethari naanum ponenadi (2)

yendi yendi
ottu moththa
ulaga azhagaellaam
oruthi mattum vachirukkiye

emmanasa kaimaa panni
kurumaa pola kothikka
nee vittuputtiye

all in all azhaguraja
naanthaan ammaadi
un manasa repair aakka
porandha killaadi.

paartha udane pulse-a yethi
poraale emmaa emmaadi
GPSu illaamale varuven
naan un pinnaadi.

karakudi ilavarasi
en nenja thaakura maharasi
thoothukudi varagarasi
nee kaaya podura ena alasi. (2)

masakkiye masakkiye
mayangi naanum ponenadi
sirikkiye sirikkiye
sethari naanum ponenadi

yendi yendi
ottu moththa
ulaga azhagaellaam
oruthi mattum vachirukkiye

emmanasa kaimaa panni
kurumaa pola kothikka
nee vittuputtiye

kannu
adhu gun-u madhiri
kannam
adhu bannu madhiri
paarvai
adhu jinnu madhiri
podhai uyethudhudaa

mooku
adhu gulfi madhiri
udhadu
adhu burgi madhiri
ponnu
iva vera madhiri
enna konnaadaa

karakudi ilavarasi
en nenja thaakura maharasi
thoothukudi varagarasi
nee kaaya podura ena alasi.
